privacy_policy_intro: Welcome to "Sahifaty". We place the utmost importance on your data privacy and the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when using our website and mobile application.
privacy_policy_section_1_a_content:
When registering with "Sahifaty", we collect the following information to personalize your experience and improve the recommendation engine:
• Credentials: Username, encrypted password, or login data via (Facebook/iPhone/Google).
• Personal Data: Name, gender, year of birth.
• Geographical Data: Country, and state/province.
• Educational Data: Educational level, and field of specialization.
privacy_policy_section_1_b_content:
• Mastery Record: Verses you have evaluated (Mastered, for review, etc.).
• Content Interests: Topics you interact with to feed the recommendation engine.
privacy_policy_section_1_c_content:
• Purchases: Record of license purchases (without storing credit card data directly, as it is processed through trusted payment providers).
• Activation Codes: Record of codes created (Promo Codes) or received via the "Hiba" system.
privacy_policy_section_2_content:
We use the data we collect for the following purposes:
1. Service Activation: Verifying the usage license and account validity.
2. Recommendation Engine: Providing personalized memorization recommendations based on your educational level, specialization, and verse mastery rate.
3. Content Management: Enabling the triple review system (Modifier, Supervisor, Decision-maker) to ensure the accuracy of indexing Quranic topics.
4. Hiba System: Managing the distribution of free and owned usage licenses.
5. Communication: Sending notifications about your proposal status or important application updates.
privacy_policy_section_3_content:
• We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.
• Public Data: Some data (such as username and index contributions) may appear to supervisors and decision-makers as part of the review workflow.
• Organizations: If you belong to a center or association using "Enterprise Services", the center manager may be able to see reports of your memorization progress.
privacy_policy_section_4_content:
We are committed to protecting your data through:
• Encrypting passwords using advanced algorithms (e.g., PBKDF2).
• Using secure communication protocols (HTTPS) for data transfer.
• Regular backups to ensure your mastery and evaluation records are not lost.
privacy_policy_section_5_content:
You have the right to:
• Access and modify your profile data at any time.
• Request permanent deletion of your account.
• Opt-out of receiving marketing messages.
privacy_policy_section_6_content: We may update this policy from time to time to reflect changes in the application or relevant laws. You will be notified of any material changes via email or through an in-app notice.
privacy_policy_section_7_content: If you have any inquiries about the privacy policy, please contact us via technical support email within the application: info@sahifati.org
